text: (ai rasool unase) kaho to ki tumhaare (banae hue) shareekon mein se koee aisa bhee hai jo tumhen (deen) haq kee raah dikha sake tum hee kah do ki (khuda) deen kee raah dikhaata hai to jo tumhe deene haq kee raah dikhaata hai kya vah jyaada haqadaar hai ki usake hukm kee pairavee kee jae ya vah shakhsh jo (doosare) kee hidaayat to dar kinaar khud hee jab tak doosara usako raah na dikhae raah nahee dekh paata to tum logon ko kya ho gaya hai
